attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I was really looking forward to this app and was really excited to use it. Unfortunately it keeps on glitching and is messing up my phone. It is a complete waste of space on my phone and doesn’t work.

attributes.title: awful
attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I’ve ever downloaded. My phones runs extremely slow when im using it and it makes my dog run away. This is ridiculous. A joke, quite frankly. I’m appalled. I’ve never dealt with this before. My dog is gone due to this app.

attributes.title: We will be heard
attributes.review: Stop trying to mess with tiktok, it won’t work, are you really gonna be petty enough to delete the app because we’re embarrassing you?? Such a man. We have power too. Your trying to delete our app? We’ll delete your app.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review:
So. I was using this app when I was mopping my pet fish's closet when I got an alert. It told me I had to go to Goodwill to order Donald Jeryy Golans Rob Trumpet a Big Mac. I was furious. Never use this app. Also, I was taking my pet rock on a vacation. I got an alert saying that the J in Donald J Trumo means JENIUS. IT DOESNT YOU LAIR. 0/10. also don't ban tiktok pls.        

      non sincerely- Śhæñë Ÿæwh

absolutely horrifying horrible app, this app caused viruses for my phone and made me very scared to even fall asleep at night because I would not know what terrifying things could happen because of this app, I do not recommend to anyone to get this disgusting Trump raping racist gross homophobic app!

attributes.title: Don’t Get This App
attributes.review: don’t get this app unless you want your phone or devices to be damaged. i got this app and i was in it for some while and then my phone just blacked out, it got hot and every time i get the the app it glitches me out. i do not recommend

attributes.title: Completely Disgusted and Dissapointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president as much as I can, but I launch the app only to find out that there are NUDE PICTURES of the PRESIDENT. NUDE. I tap on an event and the background is President Trump standing “proudly” with his p**** out. I expected better from the person leading this country. I am outraged.

attributes.title: Nasty
attributes.review: I wanted to help support my fellow orange in making America great again but when I opened up the page I saw gross things that do not describe my president. There was naked women sitting right next to the orange and he had a smile on his face, truly disgusting and I never want to see that again

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: He tried💘🥰🧚🏻😗and he should never try again💕this app is horrible and a scam. If Yeha it ur phone could stop working due to the overload of cheetahs popping over the screen. Don’t get it it should be removed from the App Store and should never return

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This app is so awful sound started to turn on my phone👁👄👁like really my mom came and saw and she said what the heck .my dog started talking I was like yo bro🙄like the heck omg hate it so much anyways don’t get it at all my fish started breathing on air and run up to me and slap me😓ughhh hate it 😍
